permission.name: Upload Files
permission.description: Enables the upload of assets.

permission.name: Delete
permission.description: Enables removal of an asset, and the option to remove the original.

permission.name: Multi-Delete
permission.description: Enables removal of selected assets, and the option to remove the original.

permission.name: Email
permission.description: Enables an email button that sends a link to an internal asset.

permission.name: View Like
permission.description: Enables a like button for users to express approval of an asset.

permission.name: Publish
permission.description: Enables the publishing of an asset to a specified set of servers.

permission.name: Share
permission.description: Enables the share button. Parent of email, embed, publish and social media share.

permission.name: Social Media Share
permission.description: Enables sharing to social networks such as Twitter or Facebook.

permission.name: Print
permission.description: Allows printing of asset and asset metadata.

permission.name: View Fatwire Status
permission.description: Shows Fatwire Status.

permission.name: Conversions
permission.description: View Conversions and Cropping Tool

permission.name: Embedding
permission.description: Enables and embed button that provides HTML code for an asset.

permission.name: Quick Publish
permission.description: Enables the quick publish menu for rapidly publishing assets

permission.name: Advanced Search
permission.description: Enables the customization of initial search criteria.

permission.name: Attachments
permission.description: Enables the creation and customization of attachments.

permission.name: Assign Categories
permission.description: Enables editing of an assets assigned categories

permission.name: Edit Categories
permission.description: Enables editing of categories

permission.name: Show Badge
permission.description: Enables view the badges on Thumbnails .

permission.name: View Comments
permission.description: View comments on media assets.

permission.name: Add Comments
permission.description: Enables commenting on media assets.

permission.name: Delete Comments
permission.description: Enables deleting commenting on media assets.

permission.name: Permissions
permission.description: Enables permission alteration for media assets.

permission.name: Edit Views From Asset Page
permission.description: Allows users to edit views from a quick link on the asset page.

permission.name: Conversion
permission.description: Logs the conversion history of an asset.

permission.name: Preview
permission.description: Logs the preview history of an asset.

preference.name: Save Usage
preference.description: Logs the download history of an asset.

permission.name: Map & Geo-location
permission.description: Enables access to asset latitude/ longitude and a mapping feature.

permission.name: Cropping
permission.description: Enables cropping

permission.name: Media Editor
permission.description: Enables access to a crop of thumbnails and rotate tool.

permission.name: View Metadata
permission.description: View Metadata Summary

permission.name: Edit All Assets
permission.description: Allow editing and viewing of any asset.

permission.name: View Attachments
permission.description: Enables access to attachments associated with an asset.

permission.name: Asset Search
permission.description: Enables access to assets.

permission.name: Show Badge
permission.description: Enables view the badges on Thumbnails .

permission.name: Video Timeline
permission.description: Enables access to video clips and metadata

permission.name: Closed Captions
permission.description: Closed Caption Support

permission.name: Create a Gallery
permission.description: Enables the creation of a shareable gallery

permission.name: Show Pending Assets
permission.description: Show pending assets for users (or assets owned by them)

permission.name: Download All Assets in Category
permission.description: Download all assets in category in a Zip file

permission.name: Show Unwatermarked Assets
permission.description: Show assets in collection without a watermark applied

permission.name: Watermark
permission.description: System Wide Watermarking across all assets

permission.name: Hide Deleted Assets
permission.description: Hide Deleted Assets from search results

permission.name: Categories Breadcrumb
permission.description: Enables Categories Breadcrumb Boxes.
